text: ➡️Kwixesha elilandelayo nidlala lomdlalo, ungakha ibali elitsha okanye ubeliqhawe kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo okanye uqhubeke nebali esele niliqalile kunye.

SourceText: Exercise is a great way to spend time together and it is so good for your health. 🌱 Find a sport or exercise that both you and your teen want to do and try it out together!
text: Ukuzivocavoca yindlela entle yokuchitha ixesha kunye kwaye kulungele impilo yakho. 🌱Fumana umdlalo okanye sebenzisa lonto wena nomntwana wakho nifuna ukuyizama kunye!

SourceText: ⚽ Together you can walk, run, play soccer, swim, dance, or do any other sport..
text: ⚽Kunye ningahamba, nibaleke, nidlaleibhola, niqubhe, nidanise, okanye nenze omnye umdlalo..

SourceText: 🔄 If you or your teen do not like the first exercise you pick, try a new exercise.
text: 🔄Ukuba wena okanye umntwana wakho ofikisayo anikuthandi ukuzivocavoca kokuqala benikukhethile, zamani okutsha ukuzivocavoca.

SourceText: *Make up a story*
text: *Yenza ibali*

SourceText: Creating stories together is a great way to learn the art of storytelling - and to build your teen’s creativity! 📖
text: Ukwenza ibali kunye yindlela entle yokufunda ubugcisa bokubalisa ibali - kwaye ukwakha ubuchule besakhono yomntwana wakho ofikisayo!📖

SourceText: 🔟 With your teen, come up with 10 words to use. They can be any words you want! For example: banana, spaceship, fish, water, painting, wasp nest, cooking, wedding.
text: 🔟Kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo, yizani namazwi ayi 10 enizokuwasebenzisa. Ingaba nawaphina amazwi eniwafunayo! Umzekelo: bhanana, isiphekepheke, intlanzi, amanzi, ukupeyinta, indlwane yoonomeva, ukupheka, umtshato.

SourceText: 🎂 Start your story with, “Once upon a time, there was a…” and make sure you use one of the words from the list in your sentence. For example, “Once upon a time, there was a family who worked on a *banana* farm.”
text: 🎂Qalisa ibali lakho ngokuthi, "Ngaminazana ithile, kwakukho i..." kwaye uqinisekise ukuba usebenzisa elinye lalamagama akuluhlu kwisivakalisi sakho. Umzekelo, " Ngaminazana ithile, kwakukho usapho olwalusebenza kwi fama yama bhanana."

SourceText: 📝 Let your teen make up the next sentence using another word from the list.
text: 📝Yenza umntwana wakho ofikisayo enze isivakalisi esilandlelayo esebenzisa elinye igama elikuluhlu.

SourceText: 🔄 Take turns until you have used as many words from the list as you can, or until you have finished your story.
text: 🔄Tshintsha nani nide nibe niwasebenzise onke lamagama akuluhlu kangangoko ninako, okanye nide nibe niligqibile ibali.

SourceText: 🔔 Be as creative as possible with your story and do not tell your teen what to say. It does not need to be a real story to be a good story!
text: 🔔Yiba nobuchule kangangoko kunokwenzeka ngebali lakho kwaye ungamxeleli umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba yintoni oyitshiloyo. Akudingeki ibe libali eliyinyani ukuze libe libali elilungileyo!

SourceText: 🎁 Ask your teen what their favourite part of the story was, and tell them yours!
text: 🎁Buza umntwana wakho ofikisayo yeyiphi indawo ayithandileyo kwibali, kwaye ubaxelele eyakho!

SourceText: *Take A Pause with your teen*
text: *Yithi Nqumama kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo*

SourceText: Take a pause with your teen. This helps them deal with stress in a healthy way!
text: Yithi nqumama kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo. Lento ibanceda bamelane noxinzelelo ngendlela esempilweni!

SourceText: ⏰ You could take a pause before dinner, after school, before school, or before bedtime.
text: ⏰Ungakwazi ukthi nqumama phambi kwesidlo sangokuhlwa, emva kwesikolo, phambi kwesikolo, okanye phambi kwexesha lokulala.

SourceText: 👂 Sit down together and close your eyes. Listen to your breath as it goes in and out. Notice how you feel.
text: 👂Hlalani phantsi kunye kwaye nivale amehlo. Mamela ukuphefumla njengokuba ungena ubuye uphume. Qaphela uziva njani wena.

SourceText: ⭐ Take 5 more deep breaths.
text: ⭐Phefumlela phezulu ka 5.

SourceText: 👀 When you are ready, open your eyes again. Do you feel any different?
text: 👀 Xa sele ukulungele, vula amehlo akho kwakhona. Ingaba ukhona umehluko?

SourceText: ⏸ Ask your teen what it was like to take a pause. Listen and accept whatever they say about it.
text: ⏸Buza umtwana wakho ofikisayo bekunjani ukuthi nqumama. Mamela kwaye yamkela nayiphina into abayitshoyo malunga nako.

SourceText: *Name That Tune*
text: *Chaza ela culo*

SourceText: Listening to music is a great way to lower your stress and have fun with your family. 💚
text: Ukumamela umculo yindlela entle ukwehlisa uxinzelelo kwaye ukonwaba nosapho lwakho.💚

SourceText: 📻 Gather your family members and choose one person to play, sing or hum a song.
text: 📻 Qokelela amalungu osapho kwaye ukhethe umntu omnye ukudlala, ukucula okanye uku hamisha ingoma.

SourceText: ❓ Everyone else must guess the name and artist of the song.
text: ❓Omnye umntu kufuneka aqashele igama okanye umculi wengoma.

SourceText: 🎉 The first one to guess it right becomes the next person to sing or play a song.
text: 🎉Owokuqala oqashele kakuhle uye abengolandelayo ukucula okanye ukudlala ingoma.

SourceText: 🔄 Keep going around until everyone has been able to play their favourite song and let the rest hear.
text: 🔄Qhubekani kude wonke umntu ukwazile ukudlala ingoma ayithandayo kwaye uvumela abanye beve.

SourceText: *Pass the ball*
text: *Dlulisa ibhola*

SourceText: ➡️ Start in a circle and pass the ball around.
text: ➡️Qala kwisangqa kwaye dlulisa ibhola jikelele.

SourceText: *Make Housework Fun*
text: *Yenza uMsebenzi waseNdlini ube Mnandi*

SourceText: Turn your chores into games! 🏆
text: Tshintsha imisebenzi yekhaya ibengumdlalo!🏆

SourceText: ☀️ Making housework fun is a good way to teach your teen to be responsible and to rely on themselves.
text: ☀️Ukwenza umsebenzi wekhaya ubemnandi yindlela elungileyo ukufundisa umntwnaa wakho ofikisayo athathe uxanduva kwaye baxhomekeke kubo.

SourceText: 📝 Together, make a list of all the chores that must be done in your home.
text: 📝Kunye, yenzani uluhlu lwayo yonke imisebenzi yekhaya ekufukneka yenziwe ekhayeni lakho.

SourceText: 💡 Make sure the tasks are fair and things your teen can do. For example, washing up, sweeping, mopping, making the beds, and laundry.
text: 💡Qiniseka ukuba imisebenzi ilungile kwaye zizinto angazenza umntwana wakho ofikisayo. Umzekelo, ukuhlamba, ukutshayela, ukukorobha, ukondlula iibhedi, kunye nokuhlamba impahla.

SourceText: 🔄 Each week, let a different person in the family choose a chore first.
text: 🔄Iveki nganye, vumela umntu owohlukileyo ku sapho akhethe umsebenzi kuqala.

SourceText: 🎵 Play some music or turn on the radio. Music is a great way to make a boring task fun!
text: 🎵Dlala umculo okanye vula unomathotholo. Umculo yindlela entle ukwenza umsebenzi odikayo ubemnandi!

SourceText: ✅ Tick off the tasks when they are done so you can see your progress as a family. You could offer small rewards as motivation to complete activities.
text: ✅ Tikisha umsebenzi xana ugqityiwe ukwenziwa ukuze ubone inkqubela phambili njengo sapho. Unganikela ngemivuzo emincinci njengenkuthazo ukugqiba imisebenzi.

SourceText: 📺 For example, you could let your teen watch more TV, spend more time with their friends, choose what they want for dinner, or have something sweet if they do their chores in a fair amount of time.
text: 📺Umzekelo, Ungakwazi ukuvumela umntwana wakho ofikisayo abukele umabonakude kaninzi, achithe ixesha nabahlobo bakhe, akhethe into ayifunayo ngesidlo sangokuhlwa, okanye afumane into eswiti ukuba bayenze imisebenzi yekhaya ngesixa sexesha.

SourceText: ❓ If your child does not complete a chore, ask them why, and come up with a fair consequence together.
text: ❓Ukuba umntwana wakho akawugqibi umsebenzi wekhaya, babuze ukuba kutheni, kwaye uze nesiphumo esifanelekileyo kunye.

SourceText: *I’m Going on a Picnic and I Will Bring…*
text: *Ndiya kwi Pikinik kwaye Ndizaku zisa...*

SourceText: Memory games are a fun way to strengthen our brains!
text: Imidlalo yenkumbulo ziyindlela eyonwabisayo ukuqinisa iingqondo zethu!

SourceText: 🎂 Think of all the things you would have at your dream picnic.
text: 🎂Cinga ngazo zonke izinto ongabanazo kwi pikinik yakho yephupha.

SourceText: 🎈 The first person says, “On Saturday, I am going to the park to have a picnic. To this picnic, I will bring...” and they say one thing they will bring to the picnic.
text: 🎈Umntu wokuqala uthi, "Ngomgqibelo, Ndiyahamba ndiya epakini ndizobane pikink. Kule pikinik, I ndizophatha..." kwaye batsho into enye abazoyiphatha kwi pikinik.

SourceText: 🍅 For example: a sandwich, a ball, a blanket, forks, cups, a dog, or coca cola.
text: 🍅 Umzekelo: i sonka, ibhola, ingubo, iifolokhwe, iikomityi, inja, okanye isiselo esibandayo.

SourceText: 🔔 The second person adds to the first person's list, but must start at the beginning: “On Saturday, I am going to the park to have a picnic. To this picnic, I will bring...” and say the item that the first person said AND then add their own item to the list.
text: 🔔Umntu wesibini ongeze kuluhlu lomntu wokuqala, kodwa kufuneka aqale ekuqaleni. "Ngomgqibelo, Ndiya epakini ndizoba ne pikinik. Kule pikinik, Ndizophatha..." kwaye atsho into ethethiweyo ngumntu wokuqala KWAYE ngoko angeze eyiyeyakhe into kolu luhlu.

SourceText: 🔄 Each time you add an item, you must say all previous items first - in the correct order!
text: 🔄 Ixesha ngalinye wongeza into, kufuneka utsho zonke izinto zangaphambili kuqala - ngolandelelwano oluchanekileyo!

SourceText: ⭐ Each person adds to the list, while remembering all the previous items.
text: ⭐Umntu ngamnye wongeza kuluhlu, ngelixa usakhumbula zonke izinto zangaphambili.

SourceText: 👀 If everyone has a turn, keep going and building your list. The first person to forget an item restarts the game!
text: 👀Ukuba wonke umntu sefumene ithuba, qhubeka kwaye usakha oliluhlu. Umntu wokuqala ukulibala into wuqalele umdlalo!

SourceText: *This is who I am*
text: *Ndiyi lento ndiyiyo*

SourceText: Self-esteem is the way you value yourself, either in a positive or negative way. Helping your teen to have high self-esteem is a recipe for success! 🏆
text: Ukuzithemba yindlela ozixabisa ngayo wena, nokuba ilungile okanye ayilunganga. Ukunceda umntwna wakho ofikisayo ukuba nokuzothemba yi resiphi yempumelelo!🏆

SourceText: ⭐Share with your teen 3 things you like about yourself!
text: ⭐Yabelana nomntwana wakho ofikisayo izinto eziyi 3 ozithandayo malunga nawe!

SourceText: 3️⃣ Ask your teen to tell you 3 things they like about themselves.
text: 3️⃣ Buza umntwana wakho ofikisayo akuxelele izinto ezi 3 abazithandayo malunga nabo.

SourceText: For example: I am great at treating others kindly. I am great at styling my hair. I am great at football. ⚽
text: Umzekelo: Ndilungile ekuphatheni abanye ngobubele. Ndilungile ekulungiseni unwele lwam. Ndilungile kumdlalo webhola.⚽

SourceText: If your teen does not feel comfortable sharing these, ask them to write them down. 📝
text: Ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo akaziva ekhululekile ukwabelana ngazo, bacele bazibhale phantsi.📝

SourceText: *Things I like about others and me*
text: *Izinto endizithandayo malunga nabanye kunye nam*

SourceText: Here is an activity to help you and your teen notice the good parts of themselves.
text: Nanku umsebenzi ukunceda wena kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuqaphela indawo ezilungileyo ngabo.

SourceText: ☀️Ask your teen to share 3 things they like about a friend or someone they admire, like a celebrity.
text: ☀️Cela umntwana wakho ofikisayo abelane ngezinto ezi 3 abazzithanda malunga nabahlobo okanye umntu abamthandayo, njenge soziwayo.

SourceText: ❓ Ask them if they share any of these qualities, too.
text: ❓Bbabuze ukuba bangabelana na ngeziimpawu, nabo.

SourceText: 💙 You can do the same: share with your teen the qualities you like about yourself or about someone you admire - and what you like about your teen!
text: 💙Ungenza ngokufanayo: yabelana nomntwana wakho ofikisayo iimpawu ozithandayo malunga nawe okanye malunga nomntu omthandayo - kwaye yintoni oyithandayo malunga nomntwana wakho ofikisayo!

SourceText: *Make a family wish list*
text: *Yenza uluhlu lweminqweno yo sapho*

SourceText: Wish lists are a great way to set, plan and keep track of your goals and dreams. 🌷
text: Uluhlu lweminqweno yindlela entle yomiselo, ucwangciso kwaye gcina umkhondo weenjongo zakho kunye namaphupha.🌷

SourceText: 📝 To start your wish list, gather your family together and grab pens and paper.
text: 📝Ukuqalisa uluhlu lweminqweno, qokelela usapho lwakho kunye kwaye bamba ipen kunye namaphepha.

SourceText: 🚲 Allow each family member to write a list of goals and experiences they want to achieve this year.
text: 🚲Vumela ilungu ngalinye losapho lubhale kuluhlu lweenjongo kunye namava abafuna ukuwaphumeza xa kuphela unyaka.

SourceText: 🎂 For example: exercise daily, read 1 book a month, make a new friend, learn to bake a cake, learn to juggle, or go watch the local soccer team play.
text: 🎂Umzekelo: zivocavoce yonke imihla, funda incwadi eyi 1 ngenyanga, yenza umhlolo omtsha, funda ukubhaka ikhekhe, funda ukujagila, okanye hamba uyokubukela iqembu lebhola lasekuhlaleni.

SourceText: 🔔 Once you have finished, put the list up where everyone can see it daily.
text: 🔔Xa sele ugqibile, beka uluhlu phezulu apho wonke umntu angakwazi ukulibona yonke imihla.

SourceText: 🎉 As members of the family reach their goals, tick them off the list and celebrate each goal reached.
text: 🎉Njengokuba amalungu osapho efikelela kwiinjongo zabo, zitikishe kuluhlu kwaye nivuyisane ngenjongo nganye ekufikelelwe kuyo.

SourceText: ❓ As the year goes on, there might be some items some of you have not achieved. Talk to your family about whether you still want to reach this goal or whether the goal has changed.
text: ❓Njengokuba unyaka uhamba, kungenzeka kukho ezinye izinto abanye benu abangekafikelelwa kuzo. Thetha nosapho lwakho malunga nokuba basafuna na ukufikelela kulonjongo okanye nokuba lenjongo itshintshwe.

SourceText: 🔑 If you still want to achieve the goal, discuss with your family what you need to do to tick the goal off your wish list.
text: 🔑Ukuba usafuna ukufikelela kule njongo, xoxa kunye nosapho lwakho yintoni oyidingayo ukwenza lenjongo itikishwe kuluhlu.

SourceText: *Weekly Goal Setting*
text: *Ukumisela Injongo Yeveki*

SourceText: Let’s set some goals ⭐
text: Masimisele ezinye zeenjongo⭐

SourceText: ⏰ It can be helpful to set smaller weekly goals that are easier to reach. This helps us reach our larger goals over time.
text: ⏰Kungaluncedo kakhulu ukumisela iinjongo ezincinci zeveki ezilula ukufikelela kuzo. Lento isinceda ukuba sifikelele kwezona zinkulu iinjongo exesheni.

SourceText: 💡Ask your teen for one goal that they would like to achieve this week.
text: 💡Cela umntwana wakho ofikisayo ngenjongo enye abangathanda ukuba bafikelele kuyo kuleveki.

SourceText: 🔄 Make sure this goal is *specific* and  *achievable* to reach in 1 week.
text: 🔄Qinisekisa le njongo i *cacile* kwaye *ingafezekiswa* ukufikelela kuyo ngeveki eyi 1.

SourceText: 💚 You can also share your own weekly goal with your teen and support each other so you can both achieve your goals.
text: 💚Nawe ungasose usabelana ngeyakho injongo yeveki kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo kwaye nixhase omnye nomnye ukwenzela nobabini nifikelele kwezi njongo zenu.

SourceText: 🎉 Make sure to praise and celebrate your teen for their hard work towards reaching their goal.
text: 🎉Qinisekisa ukuncoma kwaye uvuyisane nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ngokusebenza nzima ukufikelela kwiinjongo zabo.

SourceText: 🔔 If your teen does not reach their goal, that is okay. Discuss with your teen the steps they still need to take or how they could reach it a different way.
text: 🔔Ukuba umntwana wakho ofikisayo akafikeleli kwinjongo zabo, kulungile. Xoxa kunye nomntwna wakho ofikisayo ngamanqanaba ekudingwa ethatyathiwe okanye bafikelela njani ngendlela eyahlukileyo.

SourceText: *Think Big, Think Small*
text: *Cinga Kakhulu, Cinga Kancinci*

SourceText: Working towards big goals can be hard! Here is a way you can help your teen set new goals for the things they want to achieve. 👑
text: Ukusebenza ukufikelela kwiinjongo ezinkulu kunganzima! Nantsi indlela onganceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukumisela injongo entsha ngezinto abafuna ukuzifezekisa.👑

SourceText: 👑 Ask your teen to come up with three things that they are good at, and discuss what they did to become so good at them. For example: keeping their room neat, helping your family with housework, or playing a sport.
text: 👑Cela umntwna wakho ofikisyao eze nezinto ezi ntathu abenza kakuhle kuzo, kwaye nixoxe ukuba yintoni abayenzileyo ukuba benze kakuhle kuzo. Umzekelo: Igumbi labo licocekile, ukuncedisa usapho kwimisebenzi yekhaya, okanye ukudla umdlalo.

SourceText: 🏆 Next, ask your teen what they wish they were good at.
text: 🏆Okulandelayo, cela umntwna wakho ofikisayo yintoni abayinqwenela ukuba bangenza kakuhle kuyo.

SourceText: 🔑 Remind them that it took work and practice to become good at the skills they have. They will have to do the same for any new goal.
text: 🔑 Bakhumbuze ukuba kwafuna umsebenzi nokuziqhelanisa ukuze baphumelele kwizakhono abanazo. Kuya kufuneka benze okufanayo kuyo nayiphi na injongo entsha.

SourceText: ⏰ Help your teen break down their goal and set up smaller goals they need to achieve to reach their greater goal.
text: ⏰ Nceda umntwana wakho ofikisayo ukuba ayicalucalule injongo yakhe kwaye abeke iinjongo ezincinci ekufuneka azifezekise ukufikelela kwinjongo yakhe enkulu.

SourceText: 📝 It is much easier to achieve a goal if you write it down! This way, you can be reminded of it as you work towards it.
text: 📝 Kulula kakhulu ukufikelela injongo ukuba uyibhala phantsi! Ngale ndlela, unokukhunjuzwa ngayo njengoko usebenzela kuyo.

SourceText: ☀️ For example, if the goal is to be good at football, small weekly goals could be to go to football practice 2 times per week, run at least 1 km 5 times per week, and learn about the sport from other football players in the community or from books or videos they find.
text: ☀️ Umzekelo, ukuba injongo ikukuba ulunge ebholeni, iinjongo ezincinci zeveki inokuba kukuya kumdlalo webhola ekhatywayo amaxesha ama-2 ngeveki, ubaleke ubuncinane ikhilomitha e-1 ka-5 ngeveki, kwaye ufunde ngomdlalo kwabanye abadlali bebhola ekhatywayo ekuhlaleni okanye kwiincwadi okanye kwiividiyo abazifumanayo.

SourceText: ✅ It is important to write down these smaller goals and let your teen tick off each task as they do them each week. Seeing themselves reach smaller goals will keep them motivated to achieve the big goal!
text: ✅ Kubalulekile ukubhala phantsi ezi njongo zincinci kwaye uvumele umntwana wakho ofikisayo aphawule umsebenzi ngamnye njengoko ewenza ngeveki. Ukuzibona befikelela iinjongo ezincinane kuya kubagcina bekhuthazekile ekufikeleleni injongo enkulu!

SourceText: *Role Playing*
text: *Ukudlala Indima*

SourceText: Let’s start acting! ⭐
text: Masiqalise ukwenza!⭐

SourceText: ❓ Role playing common stressful social moments with your teen allows them to practise how to respond so they are prepared if this moment does happen. 🌷
text: ❓Ukudlala indima yoxinzelelo lwentlalo kumaxesha aqhelekileyo kunye nomntwana wakho ofikisayo ibavumela ukuba baziqhelanise nendlela yokuphendula ukuze balungele ukuba lo mzuzu uyenzeka.🌷

SourceText: ✨ Ask your teen if they want to role play with you. You can also suggest a topic. For example, asking someone on a date, saying no to drugs/alcohol/sexting, dealing with a bully, getting a bad grade, or dealing with gossip.
text: ✨ Buza umntwana waho ofikisayo ukuba angathanda na ukudlala indima nawe. Ungacebisa isihloko. Umzekelo, ukucela ukuphuma nomntu, ukuthi hayi kwiziyobisi/utywala/ukuthumela imiyalezo ngemiyalezo ngesondo ethunyelwa ngefowuni, ukujongana nomntu oxhaphazayo, ukufumana amanqaku amabi, okanye ukujongana nentlebendwane.

SourceText: 🌙 Your teen could play the role of a friend asking you to drink at a party. You could role play an underage teen who does not want to drink. Encourage your teen to be silly and really get into character with them.
text: 🌙 Umntwana wakho ofikisayo unokudlala indima yomhlobo ocela ukuba usele epatini. Ungadlala indima yomntwana ofikisayo ongaphantsi kweminyaka yobudala ongafuni kusela.

SourceText: ⏯️ After you act out the scene, it is important to talk to your teen about the actions that you role played. You can act out this scenario as many times as you like!
text: ⏯️ Emva kokuba udlale umboniso, kubalulekile ukuthetha nomntwana wakho ofikisayo malunga nendima oyidlalileyo. Ungayilinganisa le meko kaninzi njengoko uthanda!

SourceText: *Traffic Lights*
text: *Iirobhothi*

SourceText: A group activity is a great way to bond with others! 💛
text: Umsebenzi weqela yindlela entle yokudibanisa nabanye!💛

SourceText: 💡 Choose one person to turn and face a wall. This will be the traffic officer.
text: 💡Khetha umntu abe mnye wokujika ajongane nodonga. Lo iya kuba ligosa lendlela.

SourceText: 🏁 Everyone else will begin the game at the other side of the room, or if you are outside, at a starting line. Set a long distance between the traffic officer and the players.
text: 🏁 Wonke umntu uya kuqala umdlalo kwelinye icala legumbi, okanye ukuba ungaphandle, kumgca wokuqala. Misela umgama omde phakathi kwegosa lezendlela kunye nabadlali.

SourceText: 💚 The game begins when the officer shouts “Green”, and everyone can start moving towards the traffic officer at any speed they choose.
text: 💚 Umdlalo uqala xa igosa likhwaza "Luhlaza", kwaye wonke umntu unokuqalisa ukuya kwigosa lezendlela nangasiphi na isantya asikhethileyo.

SourceText: 🔴 The officer can shout “Red!” at any time, without looking behind them. When they shout this, everyone must stop and freeze!
text: 🔴 Igosa lingakhwaza 'Bomvu!" nangaliphi na ixesha, ngaphandle kokujonga emva kwabo. Xa bekhwaza oku, wonke umntu kufuneka ame kwaye ame ngxi!

SourceText: ⏸ The officer turns around to see if everyone is frozen. If they see anyone moving, they have to send them back to the start line.
text: ⏸ Igosa liyajiika lijonge ukuba wonke ume ngxi na. Ukuba babona nabani na oshukumayo, kufuneka bambuyisele kumgca wokuqala.

SourceText: 🏆 The winner is the first person to get to the officer without being sent back to the start.
text: 🏆 Ophumeleleyo ngumntu wokuqala ukuya kwigosa ngaphandle kokubuyiselwa ekuqaleni.

SourceText: 👑 The winner then becomes the traffic officer and you can play another round!
text: 👑 Ophumeleleyo ke uye abe ligosa lendlela kwaye ungadlala omnye umjikelo!

SourceText: NEXT
text: OKULANDELAYO
note: This is a quick reply and its translation should be uniquely identified by the corresponding argument
